pullrequest.title: Add support for playing Actor animation

content.raw:
Do you think we could add a test for the new functions to `src/Mesh_TEST.cc`?

It could be as simple as loading a mesh that has a skeleton, setting the transforms and then checking the transforms. We can add `walk.dae` to `test/media/`, and in the test code we can find it something like this:

~~~
auto filePath = common::joinPaths(std::string(PROJECT_SOURCE_PATH),
        "test", "media", "walk.dae");
~~~
